title: Pset_WasteTerminalTypeGullyTrap
description: Pipe fitting or assembly of fittings to receive surface water or waste water, fitted with a grating or sealed cover and discharging through a trap (BS6100 330 3504 modified)

NominalBodyLength.title: NominalBodyLength
NominalBodyLength.description: Nominal or quoted length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system or the radius (in the case of a circular shape in plan) of the chamber of the gully trap.

NominalBodyWidth.title: NominalBodyWidth
NominalBodyWidth.description: Nominal or quoted length measured along the y-axis in the local coordinate system of the chamber of the gully trap.

NominalBodyDepth.title: NominalBodyDepth
NominalBodyDepth.description: Nominal or quoted length measured along the z-axis in the local coordinate system of the chamber of the gully trap.

GullyType.title: GullyType
GullyType.description: Identifies the predefined types of gully from which the type required may be set.

HasStrainer.title: HasStrainer
HasStrainer.description: Indicates whether the gully trap has a strainer (= TRUE) or not (= FALSE).

TrapType.title: TrapType
TrapType.description: Identifies the predefined types of trap from which the type required may be set.

OutletConnectionSize.title: OutletConnectionSize
OutletConnectionSize.description: Size of the outlet connection from the object.

BackInletPatternType.title: BackInletPatternType
BackInletPatternType.description:
Identifies the pattern of inlet connections to a gully trap.

A gulley trap may have 0,1,2,3 or 4 inlet connections and the pattern of their arrangement may vary. The enumeration makes the convention that an outlet is either vertical or is placed at the bottom (south side) of the gully trap (when viewed in plan). Position 1 is to the left (west), position 2 is to the top (north), position 3 is to the right (east) and position 4 is to the bottom (south).

InletConnectionSize.title: InletConnectionSize
InletConnectionSize.description:
Size of the inlet connection(s), where used, of the inlet connections.

Note that all inlet connections are assumed to be the same size.

CoverLength.title: CoverLength
CoverLength.description: The length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system or the radius (in the case of a circular shape in plan) of the cover of the gully trap.

CoverWidth.title: CoverWidth
CoverWidth.description: The length measured along the y-axis in the local coordinate system of the cover of the gully trap.
